attributes.action: give the British people their say on Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that the Lisbon Treaty has been ratified, we, the undersigned, demand that the British people have their say, be it a referendum or a national poll, on Europe and on our newly forged union.

While taking the country out of the European Union is out of the Prime Minister's remit, allowing the public and voters to speak up about what they want, fear or hope from Europe is not.

We feel that allowing the people their say furthers the cause of democracy and will help ministers choose policies more suited and favourable to the country's needs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
